contentfulPost.title: Optimetriks featured in France2 TV report

content.value: There has been recently more and more French companies setting foot on the Kenyan market to benefit from its hub dimension on East Africa, and a dynamic economy.
The leading news channel, France2, came to Nairobi to report on that, and interviewed some companies, even talking about an “eldorado”.
We had the chance of being showcased, with an interview of our CCO and co-founder, Marc de Courcel.
